header_text: You're out to lunch with a group of your friends. You make a joke that you think is really funny, but no one really laughs. They were probably distracted.

elements.Text: Did you say the wrong thing?

elements.name: You're out to lunch with a group of your friends. You make a joke that you think is really funny, but no one really laughs. They were probably distracted._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
